" better than $hex "
**
[3LB] Trilobit invites you to:
~ TRICADE ~
A celebration of the three decades of VCS
**
We introduce you the latest fads of 70's computerized technology:
**
D.D.A.S. - Duophonic Digital Audio System -
V.R.W.C. - Virtual Reality - With Colors! -
E.P.R.T.O.Y.T. - Electronic Paper - Read Text On Your TV-Screen! -
C.C.D.P. - Crystal Clear Digital Photographs -
R.M.I.A.T.D. - Realistic Movement - In All Two Dimensions! -
**
as your hosts:
- ilmarque - [ effect code + music + graphics ]
- visy - [ engine code + direction + design ]
**
